targets.expr: sum by(instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | logfmt | level="debug" | __error__="" [$__range]))

panels.description: Current number of bytes sent. ( Real Time )
panels.title: Current Sent Bytes

panels.description: Use LogQL Filter to filter information.
panels.title: Promtail Recent Logs

targets.expr:
100 * sum(rate(promtail_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", status_code=~"5.*"}[$interval])) 
    by (job, instance)
  / sum(rate(promtail_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$interval])) 
    by (job, instance)

panels.title: Error Requests and Logs Count - Overtime

panels.description:
- Encoded: Number of bytes encoded and ready to send.
- Send: Number of bytes sent.
panels.title: Encoded and Send Bytes - Overtime

panels.description:
- Dropped Bytes: Number of bytes dropped because failed to be sent to the ingester after all retries.
- Dropped Entries: Number of log entries dropped because failed to be sent to the ingester after all retries.
panels.title: Dropped Bytes - Overtime
